name: Time Tracker
description: This is a time-tracker web application. I have been working on a list of users with search, sorting, pagination and export to XLSX/PDF.

name: Space News
description: A website where you can view the latest news in space.

name: Exchange Rates
description: A website where you can calculate the amount from one currency to another at the current rate of the NBU.

name: To Do List
description: A web application in which you can edit, delete and create tasks with a name, description, category selection and deadline (all optional). You can also create your own categories. Initially the project was implemented using ASP.Net MVC, but then GraphQL and React were added.

name: UA DNA
description: Volunteer project, which is designed to introduce people to Ukrainian culture. I worked on sections: PLACES, BRANDS, SOLUTIONS. We used a ready-made solution as a slider - react-slick. The project is currently on pause due to reasons beyond our control.

name: Pokedex
description: A website where you can see a list of Pokemon with their name, avatar, type and the basic stats. The useContext and useReducer hooks were used to manage the application state.

name: D&L
description: Restaurant website where you can view the menu and order delivery. My task was to completely develop the frontend from a figma layout. The useContext and useReducer hooks were used to manage the application state. The project is currently on pause at the request of the customer.

name: Money Tracker
description: This is a money manager - web application for control your expenses and incomes. The project used CQRS and Event Sourcing, thanks to which it is possible to return the application state from any time. I worked on the ui/ux of the application, categories and implemented budgets.

name: Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio. All the projects that I can show are collected here. Follow the Github link if you want to see the code.

name: Marketing corporation
description: landing page of one company. There is a 3D animation on the page, which was implemented with the help of three.js. For sending CV used formspree. The customer was very satisfied with this work.
